plot outline: A trio of friends enjoy their life just by drinking, partying and roaming around with girls. During a journey back from Chikkamangaluru, the boys get tricked in a village and a gentleman offers help. The help costs them a heavy price later.
title: Rangada Hudugaru
plot: A trio of friends enjoy their life just by drinking, partying and roaming around with girls. During a journey back from Chikkamangaluru, the boys get tricked in a village and a gentleman offers help. The help costs them a heavy price later.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
